author: AirPano VR
description:
The Moscow Museum-Diorama “Tsar-Layout” (https://tsar-maket.ru/en/) is the largest interactive model in Russia. It features more than twenty-five mini-cities on a scale of one to eighty-seven, as well as:
- One hundred thousand mini-residents and one hundred interactive scenes with them.
- 750 buildings: stadiums, factories, residential courtyards, cafes, seas, lakes, bridges.
- Two and a half kilometers of railways.
- More than a thousand constantly moving trucks, cars and buses.
- More than two hundred and fifty famous landmarks of our country.
The most famous historical and natural sites from Kaliningrad to Vladivostok come to life on the model and appear before the viewer in all their splendor.

If you enjoyed this video please like, share, comment, favorite, subscribe: https://goo.gl/NZMdaz 
We regularly publish new 360 videos of the most beautiful places on our planet!

360° photos and videos, stories of our shootings, articles and FAQ you can find on our website: http://Ai
title: The Moscow Museum-Diorama “Tsar-Layout”. 6K 360° video
